function.name: terminal_execute
function.description: Execute a command in the terminal

function.name: browser_search
function.description: Search a webpage for interactive elements (links, buttons, forms). Returns structured data with links indexed for follow-up.

url.description: The URL to navigate to and search

function.name: browser_get_page
function.description: Get the text content from the current page or navigate to a new URL

url.description: URL to navigate to and get content from

function.name: browser_follow_link
function.description: Follow a link by its index number from previous search results

link_index.description: Index number of the link to follow (from browser_search results)

function.name: browser_search_page
function.description: Search for text on the current page

search_term.description: Text to search for on the current page

function.name: scratchpad
function.description: A scratchpad/planner tool for the LLM to store, update, and retrieve freeform notes or planning thoughts.

action.description: Action to perform: write a note, read all notes, or clear the scratchpad.

content.description: Content of the note when action is 'write'. Ignored otherwise.

function.name: notification_add
function.description: Add a new notification via the notification server

function.name: notification_list
function.description: List all active notifications from the notification server

function.name: notification_dismiss
function.description: Dismiss a notification by index via the notification server

index.description: Index of the notification to dismiss
